pages.text: The $(item)Lava Crystal$() is a source of great heat. Between the lava used in its creation and the power of your Soul Network, you feel confident that it will never cool.$(br2) Right clicking on any block in the world will ignite it, at a cost of 100 LP.
$(br)Furthermore, if placed in the fuel slot of a furnace, it will act as a never-ending fuel source, consuming 50LP to burn for 10 seconds, or long enough to cook one item.
